Text: Thank you very much!
Thanks for the torrent, but im not sure how to install it :/ Its just many files. Not sure how to continue the Update and Adding of the Locomotives... Any help?

@PiperMp3: For the *.rar, *.zip and *.7z files: Extract the "Assets" and "Content" folders with WinRAR to your RailWorks folder (like C:\Program Files\RailWorks\), in the "Manual" or "JustTrains" folders you find the driving manual.
If there is a *.rwp file in the package, open Railworks, go to tab "Package Manager" and click "Install" and select the *.rwp file.
For the update: Copy the content of "Railworks_V93.8c_to_V97.6_Update.rar" to your "Railworks" folder.
If you have any further questions, ask it ;-)
